issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: DistributedFileSystem#concat fails if the target path is relative.

comments.body:
I attach a patch. The current trunk code can not pass the test in the patch.

Please review it.

Thanks for working on this, [~fjk].

It's helpful to add assertion (equal/true condition and/or exception) in the unit test for the expected behavior. Specially, the {{trunk}} code fails the newly added test because pathname is not a valid DFS filename?
